name: Brainway
overview: Brainway is a simple puzzler, very similar to titles such as Sensitive, but where you must destroy all the tiles with purple circles on and without getting stuck or falling. It’s a nice twist on games like Sensitive, and was actually due for release by Genias in 1990. For reasons unknown, it was abandoned, even though it was fully completed. We hope to speak to the developers in the future to find out exactly what happened.
